title: [Abandoned Mine, Deep Shaft]
description: The air here is cold, and breathing difficult.  Very little light filters in from a crevice in the western wall, its weak luminescence quickly being devoured by the ever-present dark in this narrow tunnel.  To the east, a heavy iron railing leads deeper into the mine.
